name: Kid's Nightmare
description:
Ever since you and your wife separated, your child has been having nightmares more and more. This way, when you receive your kid's message, you decide to try to help them.

Currently Implemented:

  • One Ending (Good One);
  • 3 rooms with "fighting" system;
  • Basic Dialogue.

Future Implementions (may differ if neecessary):

  • More Dialogue and Deeper Narrative;
  • +2 more endings  (True Ending, Bad Ending);
  • Choices;
  • Save/Load Mechanisms;
  • More Objects Interactions;
  • Fixing Bugs;
  • Menu.

Thank you for playing this game! :)
